translation.en: Hey, hey! It's me, Charlie. Ready to make a super movie with me?
translation.zh: 嘿！是我 查理 准备好和我拍一部超级电影了吗？

translation.en: [imitates fanfare] I feel a movie coming on!
translation.zh: 我感觉电影灵感要来了！

translation.en: -Let's get this movie started! -[theme music playing]

translation.zh: 查理的幻彩城市 真棒！

translation.en: ♪ Let's make a movie the Colorforms way! ♪
translation.zh: 我们按照幻彩城市的方式拍电影！

translation.en: [narrator] ♪ There's no time to wait! We've got a movie to create! ♪
translation.zh: 时不我待 共创电影

translation.en: [all] ♪ And when the movie's shaping up We like to shake it up! ♪
translation.zh: 电影成型时 创意大爆发！

translation.en: ♪ Here's something that You're not gonna wanna miss! ♪
♪ Let's give that movie a twist! ♪
translation.zh: 再给电影加点曲折离奇
查理的幻彩城市 真棒！

translation.en: [all] ♪ We've got a brand-new movie to create! ♪
Let's get this super movie started!
translation.zh: 我们开始拍超级电影吧

translation.en: Once upon a time, you and I were in the Colorforms Movie Studio.
translation.zh: 很久很久以前 我和你 在幻彩城市电影制片厂
忙碌的地方 我们要在那里

translation.en: the biggest, mightiest super movie ever!
translation.zh: 拍摄史上最宏大最非凡的超级电影！

translation.en: And in this movie, I get to be the super movie hero.
translation.zh: 在这部电影里我要成为超级电影英雄！

translation.en: ♪ Whenever, wherever You need a super movie hero costume ♪
translation.zh: 不论何时何地你需要一套超级电影英雄戏服

translation.en: And with a little sticky magic…
Lightning and thunder! I like the sound of that.
translation.zh: 电闪雷鸣 我喜欢那种声音！
来吧 非凡电影制作人

translation.en: Now, Mighty Movie Maker, what should our big super movie be about?
translation.zh: 好了 非凡电影制作人 我们的超级大电影应该是什么主题？

translation.en: -But I know who could help us decide. -[MacGuffin giggles]
translation.zh: 但是我知道谁能帮我们决定
有请… -大名鼎鼎的…-麦格芬！

translation.en: [gasps] Are we making a super movie?
translation.zh: 我们要拍一部超级电影吗？

translation.en: But, MacGuffin, what should we do in this movie?
translation.zh: 不过 麦格芬我们应该怎么拍这部电影？

translation.en: -…a Silly Villain! -And I'm your super-duper flying sidekick!
translation.zh: 超级城市里？ 我是你超级棒的飞行搭档！

translation.en: -Helping is what we'll do in this movie. -Thanks!
translation.zh: 帮助别人就是这部电影的主题 谢谢！

translation.en: Your mighty super movie starts… [imitates fanfare] …now!
translation.zh: 你的非凡超级电影现在… 开始了！

translation.en: Here we go with a mighty jump! [grunts]
translation.zh: 我们开始吧！ 来个非凡跳跃！

translation.en: Here we are on top of the Mighty Charlie Headquarters.
translation.zh: 我们现在身处超级城市的

translation.en: -And here's your super sidekick coming in. -[chuckles]
translation.zh: 你的超级飞行搭档来了！
超级朋友总会互相帮助

translation.en: I Bubble Face. I a Silly Movie Villain!
translation.zh: 我是泡泡脸 我是一个愚蠢的电影坏蛋！

translation.en: Uh, I need help with my Silly Villain plan.
translation.zh: 我需要有人帮忙完成新的愚蠢坏蛋计划

translation.en: You, ha! [chuckles] Be my Silly Sidekick.
translation.zh: 你来帮我 做我的愚蠢搭档

translation.en: To the top of my Bubble Clock Tower. [giggles]
A little more of that super help would be nice!
translation.zh: 再多一点超级帮助就好了！

translation.en: Bubble Face has taken the MacGuffin to Bubble Clock Tower!
translation.zh: 泡泡脸把麦格芬带去了泡泡钟楼！

translation.en: -Our mighty movie is getting sticky. -[tense music playing]
translation.zh: 我们的非凡电影变得有些棘手了

translation.en: Mighty Movie Maker, we've got to get to Bubble Clock Tower fast,
translation.zh: 非凡电影制作人 我们得赶快去泡泡钟楼帮助麦格芬

translation.en: and help the MacGuffin. But how?
translation.zh: 我们得赶快去泡泡钟楼帮助麦格芬 但是要怎么去？

translation.en: We could go by land in my Zoomy Mighty Mobile!
translation.zh: 我们可以开着我的急速非凡汽车走陆路
不行 堵车太严重了！

translation.en: -How about we go by water? -[dramatic music playing]
In my super speedy Mighty Speed Boat!
translation.zh: 我的非凡超速快艇走水路！

translation.en: Ooh! That should get us there superfast.
translation.zh: 那样我们应该很快就能到达

translation.en: Whoa-ho-ho! Whoa! It's so speedy and so bubbly!
translation.zh: 真的好快 泡泡也好多！

translation.en: Now how can we get to Bubble Clock Tower to help the MacGuffin?
translation.zh: 现在我们怎样才能到达泡泡钟楼帮助麦格芬？

translation.en: -Hey, it's Rock Star Beach Ball Fish. -[blabbers]
translation.zh: 嘿 这是一只摇滚巨星沙滩河豚！ 咕噜

translation.en: Could you help us get to the Clock Tower?
translation.zh: 你可以帮助我们到达钟楼吗？

translation.en: -[dramatic music playing] -Woo-hoo! To Bubble Clock Tower!
Up on the top is where Bubble Face took MacGuffin.
translation.zh: 楼顶就是泡泡脸带麦格芬去的地方

translation.en: Yikes! This tower is too tally tall and bubbly.
translation.zh: 哎呀！钟楼太高了 而且泡泡好多

translation.en: Mighty Movie Maker, what could we use to climb up that tower?
translation.zh: 非凡电影制作人我们可以用什么爬上那座钟楼？
我的超级非凡攀岩运动鞋！

translation.en: These bubbles are no match for the Mighty Charlie!
translation.zh: 这些泡泡完全不是非凡查理的对手！

translation.en: This big clock pendulum is swinging in our way!
translation.zh: 这个大钟摆摇摇晃晃挡住了我们的路！

translation.en: I don't think we can go any higher.
translation.zh: 我们应该无法再往上走了

translation.en: Color me green, I'm worried! Is our mighty movie over?
translation.zh: 把我变成绿色 我好担心 我们的非凡电影结束了吗？

translation.en: And here's your super sidekick coming in! [grunts]
translation.zh: 你的超级飞行搭档来了！

translation.en: -MacGuffin! She's helping us! -That's what super sidekicks do.
translation.zh: 麦格芬？她在帮我们！ 这就是超级搭档该做的事

translation.en: MacGuffin, so glad to see you! But wait.
translation.zh: 麦格芬！很高兴见到你！ 但是等等

translation.en: Where's that Silly Villain, Bubble Face?
translation.zh: 那个愚蠢坏蛋泡泡脸在哪里？

translation.en: -[snores] -Oh, she's taking a nap inside the tower.
We better get out of here before Bubble Face wakes up.
translation.zh: 我们最好在泡泡脸醒来之前离开这里

translation.en: Oh, you are here just in time!
-In time for what? -For my Silly Villain plan.
translation.zh: 正是什么时候？ 完成我的愚蠢坏蛋计划！
我们要吹出史上最大的泡泡！

translation.en: You'll never get away with it, Bubble Face.
translation.zh: 你永远逃脱不了惩罚 泡泡脸

translation.en: -[suspenseful music playing] -Oh, Mighty Charlie, you too late!
translation.zh: 非凡查理 你太迟了！
哎呦！ 我要心想事成了！

translation.en: Our mighty movie just got really, really sticky!
translation.zh: 我们的非凡电影变得非常棘手了

translation.en: [sighs] Color me purple, I'm frustrated! Is this how our movie ends?
translation.zh: 把我变成紫色 我真沮丧 电影就这样结束吗？

translation.en: [gasps] Not if we are the ones making this super movie!
translation.zh: 如果我们是这部超级电影的制作人就不会！

translation.en: Mighty Movie Maker, let's make something super big happen!
translation.zh: 非凡电影制作人我们干一件大事吧！

translation.en: It's time for you to become the mighty hero of this movie,
translation.zh: 是时候让你成为这部电影的非凡英雄

translation.en: and help us get out of this sticky gum.
translation.zh: 来帮我们摆脱这黏糊糊的口香糖了

translation.en: With a little super sticky magic…
translation.zh: 通过一点超级棘手魔法

translation.en: You look super. Now, put your arms out,
translation.zh: 你看起来超级棒 现在伸出你的胳膊

translation.en: and use your gum-zapping power to free us from the gum.
translation.zh: 用你的口香糖攻击力把我们从口香糖中解救出来！

translation.en: Thanks for being the real hero of this movie, Mighty Movie Maker.
translation.zh: 谢谢你成为这部电影的真正英雄非凡电影制作人！

translation.en: Super thank you for helping us!

translation.zh: 没错 你是我的英雄

translation.en: Sorry about sticky bubble. I go now.
translation.zh: 棘手泡泡的事 对不住了 我要走了

translation.en: Color me happy! What a super-duper movie!
translation.zh: 把我变成欢乐的颜色！ 真是一部超级棒的电影！

translation.en: -[dinosaur screeches] -What if we made a… [imitates roar]
-Oh, oh! Can we? Can we? -[Charlie chuckles]
-Can we? -What would happen in that movie?
translation.zh: 可以吗？ 那部电影里会发生什么？

translation.en: You've got a dinosaur movie to create!
See you next time, Mighty Movie Maker.
translation.zh: 下次再见 非凡电影制作人
